column4: greetings!  new to linux and ubuntu. How do i track down things.. something sends a loud beep to my speakers on shutdown...
never mind the beep...  is installing kde a good idea?
ahh.. i c... so with ubuntu the gnome window system is what i am running
so kde would simply mess stuff upp i guess
didn't really know what kde is
it came up when i was looking for a good web editor
looking at the homepage of quanta...
quanta seams to have stopped development 2008-02
in xp environment i use Studio MX
tried to install wine to run it on but the install failed..
is kde4 a web editor? is it recomendable?
no kde4 is a desktop environment using qt4.. quanta plus was designed for qt3 (kde3) which now means that a large amount of apps require porting
or do things the healthy way and use a good text editor
great: i will check it out
